
# My Story

Hi! I’m Kennedy Spann. I’m passionate about using data to improve lives, especially in the context of maternal and infant health.

---

## Research Experience
### University of California, Davis 

#### *Equine Infectious Disease Center*

My research journey started in undergrad with studying cattle behavior and then equine infectious disease.
